description.originalText: We hired stefany for watching our daughter for 2 nights in NYC. She was very nice and courteous. Our daughter keeps asking, when is stefany going to come back. I would hire her again in a heartbeat. She made us feel very comfortable.

I had an interview scheduled with Stefany, but unfortunately, she didn’t show up and did not communicate beforehand to cancel or reschedule. Punctuality and clear communication are crucial qualities, especially when caring for young children, so this was disappointing. Based on my experience, I cannot recommend her as a reliable candidate.

Stefany jumps right in to help with your kids, making them feel seen and getting them to have fun almost immediately! She is a natural with children, and a warm and hands-on person. My 2 and 3 year old boys took no time to feel safe and secure with her soon after meeting her. She understands we are busy parents who need the help for a reason, and has that important sense of urgency, which is so refreshing and rare! We highly recommend her.

description.displayText:
Stefany is, without a doubt, one of the most exceptional caregivers I’ve ever had the privilege of working with. During our one-week stay in NYC, she became a vital part of my son M’s development. From the moment she arrived, she took full responsibility, ensuring M's daily routine included enriching activities like trips to the park, where she engaged him with nature, and countless hours of tummy time that truly boosted his motor skills. The bond she built with him in such a short time was incredible, and her dedication was nothing short of remarkable.

Stephany’s attention to detail was unmatched—she constantly offered helpful advice, from nutrition to developmental activities, showing deep care for every aspect of M’s well-being. What truly amazed me was her 200% focus on him at all times. She never once used her phone, remaining fully present and attentive. This level of dedication is so rare these days. 

Stephany doesn’t just care for children; she nurtures them with a level of compassion and love that every parent dreams of finding in a caregiver. Her patience, warmth, and professionalism are simply unparalleled, and her enormous heart shines through in everything she does. Any family would be incredibly lucky to have her—she is a true gem!
description.originalText:
Stefany is, without a doubt, one of the most exceptional caregivers I’ve ever had the privilege of working with. During our one-week stay in NYC, she became a vital part of my son M’s development. From the moment she arrived, she took full responsibility, ensuring M's daily routine included enriching activities like trips to the park, where she engaged him with nature, and countless hours of tummy time that truly boosted his motor skills. The bond she built with him in such a short time was incredible, and her dedication was nothing short of remarkable.

Stephany’s attention to detail was unmatched—she constantly offered helpful advice, from nutrition to developmental activities, showing deep care for every aspect of M’s well-being. What truly amazed me was her 200% focus on him at all times. She never once used her phone, remaining fully present and attentive. This level of dedication is so rare these days. 

Stephany doesn’t just care for children; she nurtures them with a level of compassion and love that every parent dreams of finding in a caregiver. Her patience, warmth, and professionalism are simply unparalleled, and her enormous heart shines through in everything she does. Any family would be incredibly lucky to have her—she is a true gem!

A caregiver with a heart of gold and vast experience joins your home. With boundless energy and genuine love for children, she creates a haven of safety and warmth. Her dependable care makes her an invaluable addition to any family seeking peace and joy for their little ones. Highly recommended for her dedication and professionalism!

It is my pleasure to recommend Stefany as a nanny. Although Stefany has not worked directly for my family, I have had the privilege of observing her work with several other families in our community. Her professionalism, dedication, and love for children are evident in everything she does.

Stefany has cared for the children of several of my friends and neighbors, and they all agree that she is an exceptional nanny. The families she has worked with have praised her ability to connect with children and her capacity to create a safe, loving, and educational environment.

Some of the qualities that stand out about Stefany include:

	•	Responsibility and punctuality: She always arrives on time and fulfills all assigned tasks.
	•	Communication skills: She maintains clear and effective communication with both children and parents.
	•	Problem-solving ability: She handles unexpected situations with calmness and efficiency.
	•	Creativity: She organizes games and educational activities that keep the children entertained and stimulated.

I have seen Stefany interact with children in a patient and caring manner, and her ability to manage various situations professionally is impressive. The children in her care always seem happy and secure, which speaks volumes about her skills as a caregiver.

The families she works for have repeatedly expressed their gratitude and satisfaction with her performance, further reinforcing my confidence in her ability to care for children exceptionally well.

If you are looking for a trustworthy, dedicated, and loving nanny, Stefany is undoubtedly an excellent choice. I am confident that any family who hires her will be very satisfied with her work.
